title: Create new deployment for Audit service (GCP)
content:
You must deploy Audit service in a separate namespace. Do not use any existing namespaces (for example, the ESM namespace). You can use the tool provided by OPTIC Management Toolkit (OMT) to create an Audit deployment. This tool gets a unique namespace for Audit, default certificate, and service account prepared for installing the Audit Helm charts.

  1. Log in to the bastion node as a root user.
  2. Run the following commands to create an Audit service deployment. 
    cd $CDF_HOME/scripts
cdfctl deployment create -d <Audit Deployment Name> [-n <Audit Namespace>]
    or 
    $cdfctl deployment create -d <Audit Deployment Name> -n ${Audit NAMESPACE} -t helm
    For example: 
    cd $CDF_HOME/scripts
cdfctl deployment create -d auditns
    or 
    cdfctl deployment create -d auditns -n auditns -t helm
    The -n option is optional. If you do not specify this option, the value defaults to the deployment name (the value of the -d option). You can run the ./cdfctl.sh deployment -h command to view other options.

    When the application deployment is successful, you will see this message: "Successfully created deployment <name>".
